Tamarac.Plantation Walk:
Plantation Walk is a new mixed-use complex being built in Plantation, Florida, a suburb of Fort Lauderdale. The complex includes the office tower, hotel and parking decks from the demolished Fashion Mall, a three-level shopping mall that opened in 1988 and closed in December 2006 following hurricane damage.


== History ==
Fashion Mall opened with Lord and Taylor as an anchor store in early 1988.
